channel.title: Notes on Open Plant Pathology
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Open Plant Pathology

item.title: Linear modelling of soil temperature effects on root lesion nematode population densities in R
item.description: div.sourceCode { overflow-x: auto; } table.sourceCode, tr.sourceCode, td.lineNumbers, td.sourceCode { margin: 0; padding: 0; vertical-align: baseline; border: none; } table.sourceCode { width: 100%; line-height: 100%; background-color: #f8f8f8; } td.lineNumbers { text-align: right; padding-right: 4px; padding-left: 4px; color: #aaaaaa; border-right: 1px solid #aaaaaa; } td.sourceCode { padding-left: 5px; } pre, code { background-color: #f8f8f8; } code span.kw { color: #204a87; font-weight: bold; } /* Keyword */ code span.
